Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary variable indicating if worker W is assigned to team T.

Name: assign_us_to_sprint
Description: Binary variable indicating if user story US is assigned to sprint SP.

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: Binary variable indicating if task TSK is assigned to worker W.

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary variable indicating if feature F is included in release plan REP.

Name: set_sprint_start_date
Description: The chosen start date for a specific sprint.

Name: set_team_size
Description: The number of workers assigned to a team.

Name: determine_sprint_order
Description: Integer variable representing the sequence number of a sprint in the project.

Name: set_user_story_priority
Description: The priority level assigned to a user story on a scale of 1 to 10.

Name: allocate_budget_to_feature
Description: The amount of budget allocated to develop a specific feature.

Name: assign_po_to_project
Description: Binary variable indicating if Product Owner PO is assigned to project P.

Name: assign_sm_to_team
Description: Binary variable indicating if Scrum Master SM is assigned to team T.
